Please note that the WHMCS API must be e: Please note that the WHMCS API must be enabled in your WHMCS installation. To enable the API, log in to your WHMCS admin area, navigate to Setup > Staff Management > Manage API Credentials, and create a new API credential.
This module, developed by :solutions, in: This module, developed by :solutions, integrates WHMCS with Freescout. It allows you to connect customers between the two systems, view customer details, invoices, services, and domains from WHMCS directly in your application. The module also provides functionality to log in as a client in WHMCS and navigate to the client's page in the WHMCS admin area.
To set up the integration, please provid: To set up the integration, please provide your WHMCS base URL, API identifier, and API secret in the fields below.
